content:
Add data fields, states, actions, and other elements to your FlexCard. Style an element and configure its properties in the FlexCard Designer.

Create a FlexCard, and configure basic settings and a data source. See Create a FlexCard.

From the FlexCards tab, click a version of a FlexCard to open the FlexCard Designer.
To add an element to a state from the Build panel, perform one of these tasks:

* To add an element from a search: In the search field, enter the name of an element, and drag it into a state on the canvas.
* To add an element from the lists of available elements: Click Fields, or drag the Field element into a state on the canvas. See FlexCards Display Elements Reference.

To configure the element, click the element to update its properties from the Properties panel.
To easily distinguish between elements, update the Element Name.

Beginning Winter '22, add Input components to enable users to enter data or select from a list of options you provide. Configure an action to update the data source with the user selected data.

See FlexCards Common Display Element Properties and Add Conditions to a FlexCard Element for more information.
title: Adding Elements to a FlexCard in OmniStudio
